t: DTC Brand | Shavelogic
s: Shavelogic is an American brand founded in 2009 by Rob Wilson and Duwayne Miller, offering innovative designs and technologies for a close, comfortable shave. Their five-blade razor with magnetic cartridges is easy to clean and switch, and their products come in recyclable packaging.
